page.title: 02FARMING PART 1.
page.content: Farming in the Castlederg area is mainly restricted to grassland. Because of this the main practice is dairying and beef fattening. In our area we found that rough pasture and grassland were of the same proportions. Stock Rearing - the area has several "marts" - markets for selling and buying stock - although most farmers would travel up to 50 miles to a market if the price was right. Many farms supply direct to meat factorys in Omagh (20 miles) and Enniskillen (35 miles) which makes this job more secure.
